login.noAccount:
Invalid information.
If you don't have an account,
 please login after registering
login.invalidInput: Please enter both username and password.
login.redirectSignup: Are you not a registered user?

profile.title: My Profile
profile.nameDesc: The name that identifies you on this world.
profile.emailDesc: You receive messages from this site at this address.
profile.passwordDesc: Check your email account for instructions to reset your password.
profile.passwordDescDone: We have sent a message to {{email}}. Click the link in the message to reset your password.
profile.passwordDescFail: Email not sent due to the error.
profile.withdrawalMsg: Are you sure you want to withdraw?
profile.withdrawalDoneMsg:
You are successfully withdrawn. 
Click OK to navigate to home.

space.spaceTypeDesc: Select the type of space to be created.
space.passwordDesc: Participants must enter the password to enter.
space.spaceNameDesc: Enter the name of the space to be created.
space.lobbyModeDesc: Only participants approved by the moderator may enter.
space.invalidName: Space name must be at least one letter
space.leaveMsg: Are you sure you want to leave?
space.leaveDoneMsg:
You successfully leaved. 
Click OK to go back to lobby.
space.deleteMsg: Are you sure you want to delete
space.deleteDoneMsg:
You successfully deleted. 
Click OK to go back to lobby.
space.privateMsg:
This space requires password.
Enter password to join.
space.lobbyMsg:
This space requires owner's acceptance.
You'll join when owner accepts your request.
space.privateBothMsg:
This is a private space.
Enter password or request to join.
space.participateRequestFailed: Failed to request to join space!
space.participateRequestRejected: Rejected your request to join space!

setting.passwordDesc: Participants must enter the password to enter.
setting.lobbyDesc: Only participants approved by the moderator may enter.
setting.deleteDesc: The space will be deleted and all information (uploaded files, chats, notices) within the space will also be deleted.
setting.mediaboardAuthDesc: Anyone can use a media board
setting.openMicAuthDesc: Only presenter on the platform can use audio.
setting.notImplemented: You cannot use this feature now!

avatar.createDesc: Press create to create new avatar.

fileupload.maxfilesizeexceeded: Uploaded file exceeds the maximum file size(300MB) allowed.
